attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask that the Hunting Act 2004 is tighten up by closing loopholes such as falconery and terrierwork. 

We also call for a limited number of hounds being allowed out with hunts.

We also call for the police to make policing hunts a priority.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "tighten up the hunting act 2004."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14134.asp

Prime Minister's Office
